※商談保証付きに関してはお受けできない場合がございます。: *We may not be able to accommodate requests with a business negotiation guarantee.
3ヵ月毎に自動更新のプランです。30名の集客と3件の商談（アポ）を保証します。: This is a plan that automatically renews every 3 months. We guarantee 30 attendees and 3 business meetings (appointments).
セミナー内容の企画、集客、当日の運営、当日参加者への資料送付までを弊社にて行いま: We handle everything from planning the seminar content, attracting attendees, managing the event on the day, to sending materials to participants.
マジフォロは料金に含まれています。: Majifolo is included in the fee.
初回セミナーで30人・3件に満たない場合、その四半期、又は翌四半期以降に繰り越す: If the initial seminar does not meet 30 people and 3 cases, it will be carried over to that quarter or the next quarter,
追加でセミナー開催致します。（基本は初回達成を目指します）: We will hold additional seminars. (The basic aim is to achieve the target in the initial attempt)
3ヵ月毎の契約で自動更新: Contract is automatically renewed every 3 months
3ヵ月毎に30人の集客と3件の商談を保証: Guarantee of 30 attendees and 3 business meetings every 3 months
未達の場合は未達分を次回以降のセミナーに繰り越し: If the target is not met, the shortfall will be carried over to future seminars
31人以上追加開催の場合は1人申込13,500円: For additional events with more than 31 participants, 13,500 yen per registration
参加者への電話・メールでのアポ取り: Appointment setting via phone and email for participants
マジセミ倶楽部商談保証では全件無料: All cases are free under the Majisemi Club business negotiation guarantee
マジセミ倶楽部 商談保証プラン: Majisemi Club Business Negotiation Guarantee Plan
集客・商談を保証!: Guaranteed attendee acquisition and business meetings!
※１ SEO記事作成、サマリ動画作成は、年4回まで実施可能です。また、別途オプシ: ※1 SEO article creation and summary video creation can be conducted up to 4 times a year. Additional options can be purchased for more.
※２ マジフォロは年120人分まで実施可能です。また、別途オプションとして購入い: ※2 Majifolo can be conducted for up to 120 people a year. Additional options can be purchased for more.
※３ マジフォロプラスの毎月の活動費用を含んでいます。アポ獲得時の成果報酬（1ア: ※3 Includes monthly activity costs for Majifolo Plus. A success fee of 30,000 yen per appointment is charged separately.
※４ 追加集客枠プレゼント特典は、マジセミ倶楽部にご加入いただいてから1年後に付: ※4 The additional audience slot gift is granted one year after joining the Majisemi Club and every year thereafter in the same month.
マジセミ倶楽部のお得なプラン（改定予定）: Cost-effective Plans for Majisemi Club (Planned Revision)
その他のオプション ※詳細は個別にご相談ください: Other options *Please consult with us for details
マジセミのフォロー専門スタッフが、セミナー終了直後に参加者、欠席者に対して、メー: Majisemi's dedicated follow-up staff will contact participants and absentees via email and phone immediately after the seminar ends.
セミナーの講演内容から、SEOを意識した3,000字程度の記事を作成します。貴社: We will create an article of approximately 3,000 characters with SEO in mind based on the seminar content. By publishing it on your website, you can promote content marketing.
セミナー動画をご提供させていただき、２次利用していただくためのオプションです。: This is an option to provide seminar videos for secondary use.
※一定の利用制限内であれば無料でご提供いたします。トライアル時は、有料、無料とも: *We offer it free of charge within certain usage limits. During the trial, neither paid nor free provision is available.
セミナー動画をYoutube等に掲載する場合、長時間の動画は嫌われる傾向がありま: When posting seminar videos on YouTube, etc., long videos tend to be disliked. Therefore, we will edit and provide a 5 to 10-minute video.
セミナー申込者の内、当日欠席された方に対して、当日の動画を視聴していただきます。: For those who registered for the seminar but were absent on the day, we will allow them to view the day's video.
過去マジセミで開催した録画を使って、手間なく追加のウェビナーを開催します。: Using recordings from past Majisemi events, we will hold additional webinars without hassle.
過去に貴社のウェビナーにお申し込みいただいた方（貴社の見込み客）に対して、より商: We will plan and hold a theme that leads to more business discussions (appointments) for those who have previously registered for your webinars (your prospective customers), such as competitor comparisons, product introductions, demos, etc.
貴社セミナーの運営を代行します。申込みページの作成、申込者の管理、Zoomの貸出: We will manage your seminar operations. This includes creating the registration page, managing registrants, lending Zoom, and moderating on the day. (Attracting attendees is not included. You will need to handle that.)
マジセミ代表 寺田が、貴社セミナーでのプレゼンや対談、パネルディスカッションのフ: Majisemi representative Terada will facilitate presentations, discussions, or panel discussions at your seminar. Please consult us about the theme.
“エバンジェリストAI”デジタル寺田による基調講演代行: Keynote speech by 'Evangelist AI' Digital Terada
生成AIを活用した“エバンジェリストAI”デジタル寺田が、貴社のウェビナーで基調: 'Evangelist AI' Digital Terada, utilizing generative AI, will deliver a keynote speech at your webinar.
・セミナーで講演するが、講演原稿・スライドを作成する時間がない: - Want to give a seminar presentation but lack time to create the script and slides
・プレゼンが上手な社員がいない（又は忙しい）ため、プレゼンまで含めて代行してほし: - No skilled presenters among employees (or they are too busy), so want to outsource the presentation as well
Youtubeの検索や、Googleの動画検索で上位表示を狙うための施策です。マ: This is a strategy to aim for top rankings in YouTube and Google video searches. Majisemi will create a dedicated AI avatar for your company and produce video content explaining terms. Scripts can also be delivered, and blog utilization is possible.
貴社の製品の強みを強力に認知させるための競合製品比較動画を作成します。マジセミが: We will create a competitive product comparison video to strongly recognize the strengths of your product. Majisemi will create a dedicated AI avatar for your company and produce product comparison video content. It can also be distributed in webinars.
全てのサービスにおいて、マジカン（マジセミ管理画面）から「本申込」をしていただい: For all services, if you cancel after making a 'formal application' through Majikan (Majisemi management screen) or after receiving the order form/application form, a 100% cancellation fee will be charged.
但し、ウェビナー開催については、ビジターは20名分のキャンセル料金、マジセミ倶楽: However, for webinar events, the cancellation fee is capped at the equivalent of 20 visitors for general visitors and 30 slots for Majisemi Club members.
マジフォロについては、ビジターの場合は20名分、マジセミ倶楽部の場合は30名分の: For Majifolo, the cancellation fee is capped at the equivalent of 20 visitors for general visitors and 30 slots for Majisemi Club members.
ウェビナー開催において、タイトル、告知文などの調整が遅れて、ウェビナーの公開が開: If adjustments to the title, announcement text, etc., are delayed and the webinar cannot be published by 5 PM, 10 business days before the event date, it will be treated as a cancellation and the above cancellation fee will be charged.
マジセミ倶楽部の退会時、集客枠残について返金できません。: No refunds will be made for remaining slots upon withdrawal from Majisemi Club.
マジセミ倶楽部の主旨を鑑み、マジセミ倶楽部の契約開始から１年以内の解約の場合、ペ: Considering the purpose of Majisemi Club, a penalty is set for cancellations within one year of the contract start. Please understand. (The difference from the visitor fee will be charged.)
開催4週間前を過ぎての発注は、料金が割り増しになります。: Orders placed less than 4 weeks before the event will incur a surcharge.
（開催4週間前以前の発注）: (Order placed more than 4 weeks before the event)
開催4週間前を過ぎての発注: Order placed less than 4 weeks before the event
開催3週間前を過ぎての発注: Order placed less than 3 weeks before the event
開催4週間前の本申込みが間に合わない場合、割増料金の設定はございませんが、ご相談: If the formal application cannot be made 4 weeks before the event, there is no surcharge, but the event will be postponed upon consultation.
■基本的には6週間前から打ち合わせし、開催4週間前に本申込みいただくスケジュール: ■ Generally, meetings start 6 weeks in advance, and the formal application is made 4 weeks before the event.

Yuichi Terada
IT・製造業専門セミナーマーケティングサービス「マジセミ」の運営: Operation of the IT and manufacturing industry specialized seminar marketing service 'Majisemi'
昨年実績 約1,0００回開催、延べ動員数 約6０,000人（2023年）: Last year's achievements: Approximately 1,000 events held, total attendance of about 60,000 people (2023)
デジタル関連のプロダクトやサービスとの新たな出会いと体験の場を創造することで\n: Creating new encounters and experiences with digital-related products and services to promote the development of domestic industries and the advancement of engineers.
そのために、提供企業の規模の大小に関係なく、優れた技術やその可能性を広く社会に伝: To achieve this, we convey the excellence and potential of technology widely to society, regardless of the size of the providing company.
エンドユーザーに対して、技術そのものではなく、その技術でどのような課題が解決でき: We clearly communicate to end users not the technology itself, but how it can solve their problems.
2025年には、年間2,000回のウェビナーを開催する: By 2025, we aim to host 2,000 webinars annually.
